class.comment:
Represents a type of memory. Used by mobs to remember things.
Memory documentation is also forked from [MobChip](https://mobchip.gamercoder215.me/me/gamercoder215/mobchip/ai/memories/EntityMemory.html)'s documentation.

JOB_SITE.comment: The location of the Job Site for this Entity.

POTENTIAL_JOB_SITE.comment: Any potential Job Sites for this Entity.

MEETING_POINT.comment: The meeting point for this Entity.

SECONDARY_JOB_SITE.comment: A list of secondary Job Sites for this Entity.

NEAREST_LIVING_ENTITIES.comment: A list of the nearest Living Entities.

VISIBLE_VILLAGER_BABIES.comment: The list of visible Villager babies.

ATTACK_COOLING_DOWN.comment: Whether this entity's attack is cooling down.

PATH.comment: The path that this entity is currently on.

INTERACTABLE_DOORS.comment: A list of interactable doors for this entity.

DOORS_TO_CLOSE.comment: A set of doors to close for this entity.

NEAREST_BED.comment: The nearest bed for this entity.

HURT_BY.comment: The last damage DamageSource that hurt this entity.

HURT_BY_ENTITY.comment: The entity that hurt this entity.

AVOID_TARGET.comment: The current entity target to avoid.

NEAREST_HOSTILE.comment: The nearest hostile towards this entity.

NEAREST_ATTACKABLE.comment: The nearest attackable entity according to this entity.

HIDING_PLACE.comment: The currently identified hiding place for this entity.

HEARD_BELL_TIME.comment: How long a Bell has been heard.

CANT_REACH_WALK_TARGET_SINCE.comment: How long this entity has been prevented from eaching its walk target.

GOLEM_DETECTED_RECENTLY.comment: Whether a Golem has been detected recently.

LAST_SLEPT.comment: The timestamp for when this entity last slept.

LAST_WOKEN.comment: The timestamp for when this entity last woke up.

LAST_WORKED_AT_POI.comment: The timestamp for when an entity last worked at a current point-of-interest site.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_ADULT.comment: The nearest visible adult mob according to this entity.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_WANTED_ITEM.comment: The nearest visible wanted item according to this entity.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_NEMESIS.comment: The nearest visible 'nemesis' according to this mob.

PLAY_DEAD_TICKS.comment: How many ticks this entity should play dead for.

TEMPTING_PLAYER.comment: The player this entity is tempting.

TEMPTATION_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks for this entity's own temptation.

GAZE_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks for this entity's own gaze.

IS_TEMPTED.comment: Whether this entity is currently being tempted.

LONG_JUMP_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks, for this entity's long jump.

LONG_JUMP_MID_JUMP.comment: Whether this entity is currently in its long jump/

HAS_HUNTING_COOLDOWN.comment: Whether this entity has a hunting cooldown.

RAM_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks, for this entity to ram another entity.

RAM_TARGET.comment: The current location of the ramming target.

IS_IN_WATER.comment: Whether this entity is currently in water.

IS_PREGNANT.comment: Whether this entity is currently pregnant.

IS_PANICKING.comment: Whether this entity is currently panicking.

UNREACHABLE_TONGUE_TARGETS.comment: A list of unreachable tongue targets for a Frog.

ANGRY_AT.comment: The UUID of the entity this entity is currently angry at.

UNIVERSAL_ANGER.comment:
Whether this entity has universal anger turned on.
This is the mechanic zombie piglins use to all target the player who damaged one of them.

ADMIRING_ITEM.comment: Whether this entity is currently admiring an item.

TIME_TRYING_TO_REACH_ADMIRE_ITEM.comment: The current number of ticks this entity has spent trying to admire an item.

DISABLE_WALK_TO_ADMIRE_ITEM.comment: Whether attempting to cfurrently walk to an admiring item is disabled.

ADMIRING_DISABLED.comment: Whether admiring an item is disabled.

HUNTED_RECENTLY.comment: Whether this entity has hunted recently.

CELEBRATE_LOCATION.comment:
The location of the celebration.
Used after a raid is won.

DANCING.comment: Whether this entity is currently dancing.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_HUNTABLE_HOGLIN.comment: The nearest visible huntable Hoglin entity.

NEAREST_TARGETABLE_PLAYER_NOT_WEARING_GO.comment:
The nearest, targetable player not wearing gold armor.
Used by piglins to identify targets.

NEARBY_ADULT_PIGLINS.comment: A list of nearby adult piglin-type mobs.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_ADULT_PIGLINS.comment: A list of nearby adult piglin-type mobs, that are visible to this entity.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_ADULT_HOGLINS.comment: A list of nearby adult hoglins, that are visible to this entity.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_ADULT_PIGLIN.comment: The nearest adult piglin-type mob, that is visible to this entity.

NEAREST_VISIBLE_ZOMBIFIED.comment: The nearest visible zombified mob, according to this entity.

VISIBLE_ADULT_PIGLIN_COUNT.comment: The number of visible adult piglins.

VISIBLE_ADULT_HOGLIN_COUNT.comment: The number of visible adult hoglins.

NEAREST_PLAYER_HOLDING_WANTED_ITEM.comment: The nearest player that is holding the item this entity currently wants.

ATE_RECENTLY.comment: Whether this entity has recently ate.

NEAREST_REPELLENT.comment: The location of the nearest repellent block that this entity wants to avoid.

PACIFIED.comment: Whether this entity is currently pacified.

ROAR_TARGET.comment: The roaring target for this Warden.

DISTURBANCE_LOCATION.comment: The location where this Warden heard something suspicious.

RECENT_PROJECTILE.comment: Whether there was a recent projectile.

IS_SNIFFING.comment: Whether this Warden is currently sniffing.

IS_EMERGING.comment: Whether this Warden is emerging from the ground.

ROAR_SOUND_DELAY.comment: A Unit Memory that represents the sound delay between this Warden's roar.

DIG_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for this Warden's digging back into the ground.

ROAR_SOUND_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for when this Warden can roar again.

SNIFF_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for when this Warden can sniff the area again.

TOUCH_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for when this Warden can touch again.

VIBRATION_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for when this Warden can receive a vibration again.

SONIC_BOOM_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the cooldown for when this Warden can perform another sonic boom attack.

SONIC_BOOM_SOUND_COOLDOWN.comment: A Unit Memory representing the sound cooldown for a Warden's sonic boom attack.

SONIC_BOOM_SOUND_DELAY.comment: A Unit Memory representing the sound delay for a Warden's sonic boom attack.

LIKED_PLAYER.comment: The UUID of the player this entity currently has high opinions of.

LIKED_NOTEBLOCK_POSITION.comment: The position of the Note Block this entity currently likes.

LIKED_NOTEBLOCK_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks, for when this entity can like another Note Block.

ITEM_PICKUP_COOLDOWN_TICKS.comment: The cooldown, in ticks, for when this entity can pick up another item.

SNIFFER_EXPLORED_POSITIONS.comment: A list of positions this Sniffer has currently explored.

SNIFFER_SNIFFING_TARGET.comment: The current sniffing target for this Sniffer.

SNIFFER_DIGGING.comment: Whether this Sniffer is currently digging.

SNIFFER_HAPPY.comment: Whether this Sniffer is currently happy.

register.comment: Registers a new MemoryModuleType with a Codec.
